Label.en: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!
Label.fr: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!
Label.es: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!
Label.zh: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!

Label.en: The Astronomer was stamped on the back with a black swastika..

Label.es: The Astronomer was stamped on the back with a black swastika..

Label.en: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!
Label.fr: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!
Label.es: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!
Label.zh: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!

Label.en: If you didn't know, they were a group of soldiers tasked with finding stolen paintings!

Label.zh: If you didn't know, they were a group of soldiers tasked with finding stolen paintings!

Label.en: A movie about them was made in 2014, featuring George Clooney and Matt Damon!

Label.en: After being returned, it was placed in the Louvre, and is still there today, unless it's away being reunited with it's brother!
